text:
Scalarr is an international mobile anti-fraud company founded in 2016. With our Machine Learning based anti-fraud solution we help mobile developers make data-driven decisions for ensuring the success of their user acquisition strategies and sustainable company’ growth.

We are proud to work with the industry’s leaders, including Pixonic, Huuuge Games, JOOM, GOODGAME Studios, Aviasales, and many others.

Scalarr won bronze for “Tech Start-up of the Year” in the 2018 International Business Awards® due to our innovative product and success in the market.

We are looking for like-minded professionals who are able to look far beyond the horizon.

Location: Kyiv, Kharkiv, Ukraine. Full-time job, in the office.

Responsibilities:

Data analysis and data processing
Preparation of different hypotheses
Training different ML models to validate hypotheses and improve the accuracy of the Fraud detection algorithms
Data visualization

Requirements:

Analytical thinking and exploratory state of mind
Knowledge of Statistics, and Linear Algebra
Good understanding of Machine Learning concepts and algorithms
Relevant work experience with ML tools Scikit-learn, Pandas, Keras, Tensorflow
Good experience in Python (or Scala)
Proficiency in SQL
Ability to process and analyze large datasets, create and check hypotheses and visualize data

Would be a big plus:

Familiarity with time series analysis and ARIMA/VARIMA, RNN/LSTM
Experience with huge data streaming
Familiarity with Spark ML/PySpark, stack Hadoop

We offer:

Work in the fast-paced Data Science and Machine Learning product company with a team of professionals
Flexible working hours
Benefits package - vacation days, sick leave, qualifying courses
Further career growth

Salary:

2 500 - 6 000 USD per month
